name: Feedly Uncropped Images
description:
Feedly crops images in both Magazine and Cards View, which is nonpractical when you're using it to follow a lot of photography blogs. This custom style changes Cards and Magazine view to display a 250px or 333px square area, where pictures are centered, uncropped and their proportions are retained.

Feedback is welcomed. Thanks.
additional_info:
02/12/2016 — Updated to new Feedly interface
08/03/2016 — Give a max width for Magazine view for better readability
11/11/2014 — Class u5entry has been renamed to u5Entry on Feedly 24.0.883
27/03/2014 — Updated for Feedly v19.2
17/03/2014 — Updated for Feedly v19.0
26/02/2014 — Updated style for Cards view to fit 4 columns on smaller screens
	     Larger images for Magazine view
26/11/2013 — URL change from cloud.feedly.com to feedly.com
11/11/2013 — Initial publication
